articles.author: Amala Balakrishner, Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets open higher ahead of Donald Trump's inauguration - CNBC
articles.description: China left its benchmark lending rates unchanged Monday. The People's Bank of China held the 1-year loan prime rate at 3.1%, and the 5-year LPR at 3.6%.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets rose Monday, ahead of Donald Trump's inauguration as investors awaited greater clarity on the policies of the incoming U.S. administration.
